DOC.brief_summary: To compare efficacy postoperative hemostasis spar postoperative ovarian function FloSeal Electrocauterization laparoscopic ovarian cystectomy
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study FloSeal Hemostasis After Laparoscopic Ovarian Cystectomy
DOC.criteria: Premenopausal woman Patients plan undergo laparoscopic ovarian cystectomy American Society Anesthesiologists Physical Status classification ( ASA PS ) 12 Patients adequate bone marrow , renal hepatic function : WBC > 3,000 cells/mcl Platelets > 100,000/mcl Creatinine < 2.0 mg/dL Bilirubin < 1.5 x normal SGOT SGPT < 3 x normal Patient must suitable candidate surgery Patients sign approve Informed Consent Patients history pelvic abdominal radiotherapy ; Patients pregnant nursing Patients receive require hormone replacement therapy surgery Patients undergo hysterectomy time Patients undergoing unilateral bilateral oophorectomy Previous history ovarian cystectomy oophorectomy Patients contraindication surgery Unfit Surgery : serious concomitant systemic disorder incompatible study ( discretion investigator ) Patient compliance geographic proximity allow adequate followup . Hormone therapy within 3 month surgery
